 It ssh'es network nodes, kills Click from user space and kernel space and runs Click in the correct mode (user ot kernel).

 It starts the Topology Manager in the right network node (not implemented).

Detailed Description

(Deployment Application) a representation of a network domain as read from the configuration file.

It contains all network nodes with their connections.

string Domain::writeConfigFile ( string  filename  ) 

Writes the standard deployment config file format to a file.

Writes the standard deployment config file format to a file. It is used along with barabasi albert model because the graph is autogenerated and the experiment can be repeated.
